workflowType.title: Computational Workflow Type
workflowType.description: The kind of Computational Workflow, which is designed to compose and execute a series of computational or data manipulation steps in a scientific application.

workflowCodeRepository.title: External Code Repository URL
workflowCodeRepository.description: A link to the repository where the un-compiled, human-readable code and related code is located (e.g., GitHub, GitLab, SVN)

workflowDocumentation.title: Documentation
workflowDocumentation.description: A link (URL) to the documentation or text describing the Computational Workflow and its use
